dt: {bc}to {d_link|train|train:2} (a person or animal) to excess or beyond advantage {bc}to harm (a person or animal) by too much training

dt.t: Don't {wi}overtrain{/wi} your dog. Lots of small lessons are better than one big one.

shortdef: to train (a person or animal) to excess or beyond advantage : to harm (a person or animal) by too much training
